CustomField.formula: ((( Average_of_Bookings_per_rep__c * Number_of_Sales_People__c ) * (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(PercentWinRate__c), "%", "")) * 0.01) ) * ( Average_Booking_Amount_per_rep__c +( Average_Booking_Amount_per_rep__c * (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(PercentBookingSize__c), "%", "")) * 0.01) )))+ (( Number_of_Sales_People__c * Annual_Quota_per_rep__c ) * (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(PercentBookingSize__c), "%", "")) * 0.01) )
CustomField.label: Annual Increase in Revenue
